snippet: Sally Jewell, a former oil company official and longtime advocate for conservation, was expected to face vigorous questioning during confirmation hearings.
abstract: Pres Obama nominates Sally Jewell, chief executive of Recreational Equipment Inc, to lead Interior Department; former oil company official and longtime advocate for conservation is expected to face vigorous questioning during confirmation hearings.

byline.contributor: Stephanie Clifford contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: Sally Jewell, a former oil company official and longtime advocate for conservation, was expected to face vigorous questioning during confirmation hearings.

headline.seo: Obama Picks REI Executive Sally Jewell for Interior Dept.
headline.main: Obama’s Choice to Lead Interior Dept. Has Oil Sector and Conservation Credentials
headline.print_headline: Obama’s Choice to Lead Interior Dept. Has Oil Sector and Conservation Credentials
